dabɛn na ndzebɔnyɛfo
column4: Dabɛn ara na ndzebɔnyɛfo ndzi ehurusi nkodu?"

column4: Nkyii so Jakob Nyankopɔn no ronndwen ho:"

column3: hom ndwen ho: Na hom nkwasea
ɔrenntse asɛm anaa? Na nyia ɔhyehyɛɛ enyiwa no
ɔrennkyerɛ nyansa anaa? Mekyerɛ nyia ɔkyerɛkyerɛ nyimpa nyimdzee no a."
Dɛ ɔtse dɛ ehubɔw bi a otwa mu ntsɛm."
osiarfo nye nyimpa a ɔwo etsea no
column4: Na ifi wo mbra no mu ekyerɛkyerɛ no;"

column2: "Dɛ ebɛma no akomatɔmu wɔ abɛbrɛsɛ nda mu
column3: Ma ekodu dɛ wobotu mona ama ndzebɔnyɛfo."
Nkyii so ɔnnkɔpow n’egyapadze."

column2: "Na atsɛmbu bɛsan akɔ tseneneenyi nkyɛn: Na akoma mu tseneneefo nyinara bedzi ekyir."
"Woana na ɔbɔsoɛr nye ndzebɔnyɛfo edzi esi ama me? Woana na obegyina nye emumuyɛfo edzi esi ama me?"

column3: Nkyɛ ɔka kakrabaabi ma me kra aakɛtsena foofoo mu."

column2: "Aber a mesee dɛ m’anan retserew no; Ao
column3: EWURADZE
column4: wo mbɔbɔrhu na osuoo mo mu gyinae."

column2: "Sɛ me dadwen dɔɔ so wɔ mo mu a
column3: W’awerɛkyekyer ma me kra enyi gye."

column2: "Aso ndzebɔnyɛfo ahengua nye wo benya anyɛnkoyɛ
column3: Dza ɔnam ahyɛdze do hyehyɛ ewurkadze no?"

column2: "Wɔbɔ bagua wɔ tseneneenyi ne kra do
column3: Na wobu bɔgya a odzi bem fɔ."
Na me Nyankopɔn ayɛ mo guandɔbea botan."

column2: "Na ɔdze hɔnankasa hɔn emumuyɛ aba hɔn do
column3: Na obotwa hɔn egu hɔnankasa hɔn mbusu mu; EWURADZE
